div.h4: VeliSphere Makes the Internet of Things Interactive.
div.p: The true inherent value of the internet of things will only materialize once the 1:1 relationship between a device and the controlling app is overcome. Our objective is to drive user value by defining a direct link between connected devices to allow for direct exchange of data and firing of actions based on a universal, user defined logic.

While the Internet of Things currently is in an early, pre-standard phase, it will also require solutions for the integration of other, legacy connectivity methods such as various bus-architectures. Our goal is to provide gateways to various protocols and legacy systems whereever possible through web services (HTTP/ReST or MQ) or physical gateway devices.

We will implement a virtualization layer on top of the physical device layer. Every physical device will have a virtual equivalent assigned, to which all configuration and logic will be applied.
This principle will allow for easy replacement of failed devices just by reasigning the spare to the existing virtual device as well as for easy batch configuration of entire fleets of devices of the same device class.
